meanings.definition: A Greek dish made from fish roe.
meanings.sent1: I tried the taramas at the Greek restaurant.
meanings.sent2: The taramas had a unique flavor.
meanings.sent3: The taramas looked like a pink cloud on my plate.
meanings.sent4: The taramas spread smoothly on the bread.
meanings.sent5: The taramas tasted like the sea in a bite.

meanings.definition: A pink or orange paste made from fish roe.
meanings.sent1: She spread the taramas on the crackers.
meanings.sent2: The taramas had a vibrant color.
meanings.sent3: The taramas reminded me of a sunset on the beach.
meanings.sent4: The taramas was as smooth as silk.
meanings.sent5: The taramas melted in my mouth like butter.

meanings.definition: A spread made from fish roe.
meanings.sent1: The taramas added a salty touch to the dish.
meanings.sent2: I bought a jar of taramas from the store.
meanings.sent3: The taramas looked like a dollop of sunshine.
meanings.sent4: The taramas transformed the plain bread into a delicacy.
meanings.sent5: The taramas was a burst of flavor in every bite.
